app_descript:
Samsung Accessory Service

Brief: Samsung Accessory Service is an app designed to enhance your experience with a range of Samsung accessories, including the GALAXY Gear series, Galaxy Watch series, Gear Fit 2, and Samsung NX-1. This app enables seamless connection between your Samsung mobile devices and accessories, facilitating data transfer and file management with ease.
